I know of many people: who would love to have an elk carcass for their holiday .
Birthdays , Christmas , Hanukkah , Martin Luther King Jr. ' s Birthday Observed , Grandparent 's Day , etc . are all holidays
where a big piece of elk meat could brighten someone 's day .
I have often used Amazon in order to buy gifts ,
and with this elk carcass GIFT WRAPPING IS NOT AN OPTION .
that half the fun of giving a huge elk carcass would be watching the look
on your loved one 's face as he or she unwrapped the slab of meat .
With the weight of the product ,
it is going to be difficult to wrap this on my own .
Sorry Uncle Tino , no elk carcass for Columbus Day this year !
